info.description: MatEdit is a tool which you can use to make good looking custom editors for shaders very fast and without any effort.
info.author: Marian Brinkmann
info.instruction:
Some Instructions:
You can use MatEdit for all your custom shaders.
Please do not distribute the tool on the internet.
To see how the tool works simply click on the documentation button below.
If you delete MatEdit from your project be sure to use the uninstall function in this window beforehand. If you only see an Upgrade or Downgrade option you have to use this first!
